name: 《古斯塔奥：帝国重生》Gustavo Kingdom Rebirth
name_original: 《古斯塔奥：帝国重生》Gustavo Kingdom Rebirth
description:
The story is mainly about the Gustavo empire. It is an empire ruled by women. After the death of the queen of the previous generation, Princess Nali, who should have succeeded to the throne, was arrested by her sister and exiled to the border of the Gustavo Empire. The player will play the heroine Nali. Step by step to save the empire that was taken and ruled by her sister. In the process of saving the crushed city in the empire, Nali found that the empire seemed to have changed in the two years when she was imprisoned. It seems that there is someone behind it. all of these......game contentGet ready for the fantastic adventure in the Gustavo Empire, play Princess Nali to explore this country that has changed dramatically in two years, pick up your Axe to conquer all the enemies that block you, they are trying to stop you from uncovering this The truth hidden behind the empire!
  • Four Axe with different attributes
  • Four types of skill combinations
  • Two thrilling Boss battles
  • Three maps with different styles, and each map is free to explore
  • Complex elements and plots
Important notes for executing the gameThis game file contains three languages, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and English. When you "execute" the game through the Steam main program, there are three options.

The first option is "Traditional Chinese version"
The second option is "Simplified Chinese"
The third option is "English version"Thank you for your preemptive experience testI hope that players will like the game we are developing, and that players who participate in the test will return all the problems you have encountered or hope to improve and join the game, etc. We will continue to update this game to make him better!
